name: Meeting Time
description:
Meetings suck and you've just been called into one - gather supplies and evade management before it's too late!

Meeting Time was developed as part of the Treasure Hunt Jam. As part of this game jam, there is a restriction of:

  • 3 sentences within the introduction
  • No graphics (except an initial loading screen)
  • No more than 6 words when responding to commands
  • Input commands restricted to VERB NOUN style commands (e.g. TAKE LAMP, THROW SPATULA, EAT BREAD, CALL FRIEND)

Instructions

If you are new to text adventure games, you can find some generic instructions below on how to navigate and interact with the world.  You should keep in mind, this is not an exhaustive list of commands, but just a list of the most basic commands available.

  • Type LOOK or R to refresh the screen.
  • Type N, S, E, W, UP, DOWN, etc. to navigate the world (compass directions).
  • Type INVENTORY or I to see what you are holding.
  • Type GET OBJECTNAME to pick up an item.
  • Type DROP OBJECTNAME to drop a held item.
  • Type X OBJECTNAME to examine an item.
  • Type HELP for help.
  • Type QUIT or RESTART to restart the game
